Subsection.Text: The board has authority to adopt rules pursuant to ss. 120.536(1) and 120.54 to implement the provisions of this chapter.

The secretary of the department is deemed to be a person substantially affected by a rule or proposed rule for the purpose of seeking an administrative determination of the invalidity of such rule or proposed rule. The secretary may seek such administrative determination of the invalidity of any rule or proposed rule on the ground that it is an invalid exercise of delegated legislative authority or an undue restriction of competition, pursuant to chapter 120.
